title: Jewellery e-commerce
description: Developed jewelry eCommerce platform using Magento, Elasticsearch, and KnockoutJS, delivering seamless shopping experience and advanced search functionality.

title: Dropping Platform
description: Built a dropship eCommerce platform with Magento, Elasticsearch, and KnockoutJS, ensuring efficient order management and seamless inventory synchronization.

title: Build API for POS Systems
description: Designed and implemented the API architecture, adhering to industry best practices and standards for security, scalability, and performance.

title: SMS Notification Extension
description: Developed SMS notification extensions for Magento, enhancing customer engagement and order updates through real-time SMS notifications.

title: Mobile Login Extension
description: Implemented Magento extensions enabling seamless login with phone numbers, enhancing user experience and streamlining authentication processes.

title: Microsoft Clarity Extension
description: Created Magento extensions for tracking user behavior with Microsoft Clarity, providing valuable insights for website optimization and user experience enhancement.
